text:
『The atmosphere feels like two people having a chat,
it's wonderful!』──I mean...

『I wonder if they talk about love like this in private too』
Or something like that...uh...
The reactions, they are really positive...

─Uh, there seems to be quite a lot of feedback
coming in about the new song─!

Yes...
I think it's because the song and lyrics are good...

There are even posts saying,
『The way you two interact feels so fun』...

If that's the case, maybe we should incorporate
elements like that into the dance choreography.

The basic choreography is already set, but I'm sure our
interaction will be entertaining to dance as well...

It might be worth discussing if we can
incorporate such moves.
I stopped by the office before coming here today.

Just now, it seems like the schedule for the
release event of the new song has been finalized.

But, it seems like there won't be
enough days for practice...

But for the people who come to see us, that doesn't matter...
so let's make sure to give them a great performance.
